Plot: Julian, a drug-smuggler thriving in Bangkok's criminal underworld, sees his life get even more complicated when his mother compels him to find and kill whoever is responsible for his brother's recent death.
Title: Only God Forgives
Actors: Ryan Gosling, Kristin Scott Thomas, Vithaya Pansringarm, Gordon Brown
tomatoConsensus: Director Refn remains as visually stylish as ever, but Only God Forgives fails to add enough narrative smarts or relatable characters to ground its beautifully filmed depravity.
